mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.material_name AS "materialName", a.material_code AS "materialCode", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM archive_material a
AND a.material_code LIKE '%'||#{materialCode}||'%' '%'+#{materialCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
AND a.material_name LIKE '%'||#{materialName}||'%' '%'+#{materialName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{materialName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO archive_material( material_name, material_code, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{materialName}, #{materialCode}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE archive_material SET material_name = #{materialName}, material_code = #{materialCode}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
